welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thisted, a charming and picturesque city known for its rich history and beautiful coastal views. We invite you to immerse yourself in our local culture and discover all that Thisted has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thisted Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Thisted Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
